pages.text: $(bred)Giga Football Zombie$() also doesn't know what's football, but it really knows how to rush, really !$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bred)Defence Health$() : $(l)300$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will randomly start rushing and speed up to $(l)Huge Fast$(), until hit the first enemy and $(bred)deal deadly damage$() to it, and start next rush after serveral seconds. When it's in rushing, $(bred)it won't be butter or cold$().
